price: 82. Ceux qui, après cela, se rétracteront, ceux-là sont les pervers.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
